sentences.en: Appreciate self is better than appreciate the pointless man.
sentences.cn: 欣赏无谓的男人不如欣赏自己.

sentences.en: But that does not mean they are pointless.
sentences.cn: 但是这也不能说明那些抗抑郁药物就毫无价值.

sentences.en: Frankly speaking , I think that learning English is pointless.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说, 学英语没什么用.

sentences.en: He often suffers her pointless fits of rage!
sentences.cn: 他经常遭受她的无名之火!

sentences.en: He shook hands without rising , and made pointless chitchat.
sentences.cn: 他握手的时候并不起身,所说的也是一些不着边际的寒喧话.

sentences.en: It is perhaps pointless to contemplate what might have been changing.
sentences.cn: 揣测情况可能如何演变也许是件无聊的事情.

sentences.en: It is pointless to have a car if you cannot drive it!
sentences.cn: 假若不会开汽车,有辆汽车又有什麽用呢?

sentences.en: It pointless for Europe to avoid the concerns about its banks.
sentences.cn: 回避本地区银行惹起的种种忧虑,对欧洲来说毫无益处.

sentences.en: It was a completely pointless thing to do for you.
sentences.cn: 对你来说干这事太没意思了.

sentences.en: It would be pointless to repeat the details of the most horrendous crimes reported.
sentences.cn: 我无法重述我所听到的最残暴的罪行.

sentences.en: It's pointless to persuade her to go to the party.
sentences.cn: 劝她去参加派对是不会有什么结果的.

sentences.en: Life just seemed pointless to me.
sentences.cn: 生活对我来说简直没什么意义。

sentences.en: So many arguments are so pointless.
sentences.cn: 因此许多争执都是不得要领的.

sentences.en: We searched until we knew it would be pointless to continue.
sentences.cn: 我们搜索又搜索，直到觉得继续下去也枉然时才罢手。

sentences.en: Who wouldn't have preferred this with life so pointless, bitter and hopeless?
sentences.cn: 谁不喜欢这样呢,生活既是那么无聊, 痛苦,无望!

sentences.en: Why some people really like to do things that pointless?
sentences.cn: 为什麽有些人那麽喜欢做一些很无聊的事?

words.tran_cn: 尖的；突出的；锐利的；率直的
不相干地；漫无目标地；不得要领地（pointless的副词形式）
要点；得分；标点；[机] 尖端
无意义的；钝的；不尖的；不得要领的

trans.tran_cn: 无意义的，不得要领的，钝的，无谓
trans.tran_en: worthless or not likely to have any useful result
